price: Na siku atakayo wakusanya wote, kisha atawaambia Malaika: Je! Hawa walikuwa wakikuabuduni?
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِيَّاكُمۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ
footnotes: Na taja, ewe Nabii, siku Mwenyezi Mungu atapo wakusanya wote, na kisha Subhanahu awaambie Malaika mbele ya wale walio kuwa wakiwaabudu: Je! Hawa walikuabuduni nyinyi khasa badala yangu mimi?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaḥshuruhum jamīʿan thumma yaqūlu lil'malāikati ahāulāi iyyākum kānū yaʿbudūna
